title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text content type does not have any effect.
EB: The dynamic text content type should properly handle and display each type of content according to its specified format.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a database record with the three types of content mentioned above in the corresponding field. 2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field. 3. Observe that the dynamic text content type does not have any effect and the content is not properly displayed according to its format.
